original_text: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
korean_text: 지혜 있는 자에게 교훈을 더하라 그가 더욱 지혜로워질 것이요 의로운 사람을 가르치라 그의 학식이 더하리라

sentences.original_text: Give instruction to a wise man
and he will be yet wiser
and he will increase in learning
